mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO at_service_card ( ID, FID, FBillNo, FBillType, FDate, FOrgID, FOrgNumber, FOrgName, FRemark, FPayID, FPayWay, FPayDate, FPayMoney, FCycleID, sync_flag, sync_time, FCreateBy, FCreateDate, FUpdateBy, FUpdateDate ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{FID}, #{FBillNo}, #{FBillType}, #{FDate}, #{FOrgID}, #{FOrgNumber}, #{FOrgName}, #{FRemark}, #{FPayID}, #{FPayWay}, #{FPayDate}, #{FPayMoney}, #{FCycleID}, #{syncFlag}, #{syncTime}, #{FCreateBy}, #{FCreateDate}, #{FUpdateBy}, #{FUpdateDate} )
